* Position your cursor at the line just above a fold * 1 Ctrl+D * Repeat above step 3 times
* jj (To position the cursor at the line below the fold) * 1 Ctrl+U * Repeat above step 3 times ### Actual behaviour The cursor gets _stuck_ at the fold while scrolling down with Ctrl+D, but not when scrolling up with Ctrl+U ### Expected behaviour Cursor does not get _stuck_ in either case

title: Cursor gets stuck on folds when scrolling down using 1<C-D>, but not when scrolling up using 1<C-U>
